description: Try our easy to follow Kerala Prawn Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Kerala Prawn Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 large jumbo prawn, peeled and deveined
1 tsp fresh ginger root, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tamarind mixture, place the tamarind paste, chili powder, cumin, and turmeric in a small bowl with the measured water and stir to mix well.
Heat the oil in a large nonstick wok or skillet over a medium heat. Add the garlic and prawn and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in the ginger, chili, measured water, and tamarind mixture. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat, and simmer for 2 minutes, then stir in the coconut cream.
Gently simmer the mixture for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly, until the prawn turn pink and are just cooked through.
Remove from the heat, season with salt, and stir in the fresh cilantro. Serve immediately with steamed basmati rice and pappadams and garnished with lime wedges.
